name: serverless-node-aws
description: Example application for running a Node Express app on AWS Lambda using Amazon API Gateway.

scripts.dev:invoke-lambda: cross-var aws lambda invoke --function-name $FUNCTION_NAME --region $REGION --payload file://api-gateway-event.json lambda-invoke-response.json && cat lambda-invoke-response.json
scripts.release:deploy: cross-var aws cloudformation deploy --template-file sam-template.packaged.yaml --stack-name $CLOUD_FORMATION_STACKNAME --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region $REGION --parameter-overrides DomainName=$DOMAIN CertificateArn=$CERTIFICATE_ARN
scripts.release: npm run release:build && npm run release:package && npm run release:deploy
scripts.setup: npm install && (cross-var aws s3api get-bucket-location --bucket $BUCKET_NAME --region $REGION || npm run setup:create-bucket) && npm run release
